body.raw:
{
  "borrowerId": "{{borrowerId}}",
  "loanId": "{{loanId}}",

    "personalInfo": true,
    "financialInfo": false,
    "loanDetails": true,
    "documents": false,
    "milestones": true,
    "communications": true
  },
  "purpose": "referral_partnership",
  "purposeDescription": "To provide updates on loan progress and coordinate closing timeline",
  "expirationDays": 365
}
